title: (x) Compagnon logo sans serif - Frutiger (customised) {Yves}

comments.content: Looks like somebody had fun with [Frutiger 65 Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103070741/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/frutiger_pro_vp/?&sample_text=compqgnon&sample_size=74).
